Despite the heavily quantitative classes, I was originally an English major. Dr. Quarmby transformed my writing from "trash" to treasure. Basically, I can write emails that make sense.', date: "(Aug 2015 - May 2019)", icon: "ti-crown", }, { title: "Oxford College of Emory University", subtitle: "Associate of Arts | Oxford, GA", description: "Served as a two-year freshman and sophomore program that transitioned to the Emory Atlanta Campus.
